title: Servicios Rimoldi | High-Performance Corporate Web Platform
description: Highly optimized business website for a leading soil movement company with over 40 years in the market. Implementation of advanced technical SEO practices, perfect performance (100/100 on PageSpeed Insights) and exceptional user experience with cutting-edge responsive design.
what_i_learned: Static site architecture with Astro Framework
Advanced web performance optimization (100/100 on PageSpeed Insights)
Implementation of low-impact animations with Intersection Observer API
Extreme optimization techniques for images and static assets
Professional responsive design with TailwindCSS
Secure development with TypeScript
Implementation of advanced technical SEO strategies
Configuration of dynamic meta tags and schema markup
Intelligent preloading strategies for critical resources
Optimized build pipeline in Astro for deployment in production environments

title: Vivero Irupe | Scalable Backend & Admin Panel
description: Robust backend platform and complete admin panel for plant e-commerce. Secure architecture with JWT authentication, optimized cache, and advanced endpoint protection. Complete system with product management, users, and real-time statistics.
what_i_learned: Enterprise backend architecture with Spring Boot and PostgreSQL
Implementation of JWT authentication system with Spring Security
Performance optimization with distributed cache system (Spring Boot and Caffeine)
Development of request rate limiting system with custom annotations
Integration with cloud services for image storage (Cloudflare R2 with S3 API)
Advanced database migration management with Flyway
Development optimization with Lombok and code generation tools
Professional API documentation using OpenAPI specifications and Swagger
Professional frontend development with React and Next.js
Implementation of advanced caching strategies and data management with TanStack/React-Query
Professional user interface with TailwindCSS and custom components
Frontend security architecture with authorization middleware in Next.js

title: Vivero Irupe - Frontend
description: Modern e-commerce platform with over 200 products, implementing hybrid architecture for optimal performance. Fluid user experience with advanced animations, page transitions and intelligent rendering strategies for maximum conversion.
what_i_learned: Hybrid frontend architecture with Astro and React for maximum performance
TypeScript implementation for secure and maintainable development
Advanced animations with ViewTransitions API and page transition techniques
Mixed rendering strategies (SSR, SSG and CSR) optimized for SEO and UX
Advanced state management and caching with TanStack Query
Integration with RESTful APIs and Spring-based backend systems

Implementation of advanced SEO strategies and schema markup
Integration of email communication systems with Resend API
Deployment and advanced configuration on cloud platforms

title: Learn Japanese | AI-Powered Interactive Educational Platform
description: AI-powered interactive educational application for effective Japanese alphabet learning. Advanced flashcard system with spaced repetition algorithms, AI-driven contextual example generation, interactive chat for queries, and gamified user experience to maximize student retention and engagement.
what_i_learned: Modern web application architecture with Next.js
Advanced TypeScript implementation for educational applications
Integration of Vercel AI SDK for generative AI features
Development of AI-powered contextual example generation system
Implementation of interactive chat with natural language processing
User interface design with TailwindCSS for optimized learning experiences
Efficient global state management with Zustand
Development of scalable UI components with shadcn/ui
Optimization of prompts for educational content generation

title: Note Creation | FullStack Note Management System
description: Enterprise web application for creating and managing notes with advanced authentication system and email verification. Secure architecture, complete implementation of CRUD operations and persistent storage in PostgreSQL with Docker.

Advanced authentication system with Spring Security and JWT
Data persistence with Spring Data JPA and optimization strategies

title: AI Interview Odyssey | Advanced AI-powered Interview Simulator
description: Advanced AI-powered interview preparation platform, integrating InfoJobs and OpenAI APIs through Vercel AI SDK. Personalized system that analyzes real job offers to generate adaptive interviews, with real-time feedback, AI-powered response analysis, and personalized recommendations to improve communication skills. Implements response streaming and advanced conversational context handling.

TypeScript implementation for secure integration with AI APIs
Conversational interface design with response streaming
Advanced integration with multiple external APIs (InfoJobs and OpenAI)
Prompt optimization for personalized interview generation
Implementation of real-time response analysis with AI
Conversational context management for coherent responses

title: SpringBoot API Forum | Scalable RESTful API

Enterprise security implementation with Spring Security
Complete token-based authentication system (JWT) and role-based authorization
Optimized data persistence with JPA and query strategies

title: Alura Hotel | Hotel Management System

title: Text Encryptor | Message Cipher

Intuitive interface that allows instant text encryption and decryption with fluid animations and responsive design.
